scenario_text.value: Yes, this is it! This is the power I need!

With it, I can take my revenge on that
wretched clan that threw me away!
You cannot mean it! It’s unspeakable!
No, Master Haruchika, you mustn’t!
We will stop you, Master Haruchika!!!
It’s too late!
Can’t you see that?
Please, Master Haruchika! Calm yourself!

If you refuse to turn aside, we will not
stand idly by!

Hmph... Say what you will. Your words will
not avail you now.

Behold the form my companion already has
taken on.
Graaaaaaaaawr!
Oh, it’s unspeakable... What have you done?

Now feast! Feast until you can feast no more!
Darkness is power! It shall dwell within you!
Feast upon...my flesh!!!
GRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAWR!!!
No! Master Haruchika!!!
What are we to do?! This cannot go on!!!
Have we no choice but to fight?!

Indeed. Loathe as I am to oppose Master
Haruchika, this evil must not be unleashed!!!
GRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAWR!!!
Grrrrrr...!!!

Heheheh... Hahahahahahaha! I will visit
complete destruction upon them!

My sister, who offered me as a sacrifice, and
all her cursed clan, no the entire world...

...I will tear them down with my own hands,
until my rage and hatred have been sated!
GRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAWR!!!
